body:
This fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37523 . 
`OpenSSL_add_all_digests and OPENSSL_init_crypto` are not thread-safe. So as suggested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37523#issuecomment-1095083240, I added  utility function to initialize openssl.
title: added new Utilities/OpenSSL and move unit tests to it
